kiru.en: to put on from the shoulders down

toru.en: to take a photo or record a film

sasu.en: to stretch out hands, to raise an umbrella

naku.en: animal noise. to chirp, roar or croak etc.

oru.en: to be, to have (used for people and animals)

narabu.en: to line up,to stand in a line

yonnichi.en: four days, fouth day of the month

hachinichi.en: eight days, eighth day of the month

hiku.en: to play an instrument with strings, including piano

sannichi.en: three days, third day of the month

kiku.en: to hear, to listen to, to ask

kesu.en: to erase, to turn off power

aru.en: to be,to have (used for inanimate objects)

kumoru.en: to become cloudy, to become dim

ninichi.en: two days, second day of the month

asobu.en: to play, to make a visit

rokunichi.en: six days, sixth day of the month

furu.en: to fall, e.g. rain or snow
